work.name: Loyal Health
work.summary: Member of a team that created and supported a chat bot for health systems, provided internal CI/CD support, and provided skunkworks projects when required.
highlights: Provided features and support for product which handled 1000s of requests a second from multiple hospital systems
Created a service utilizing Chat GPT and Agents to provide a chat service to patients using scraped data from a hospital system after a RAG lookup

Worked directly with internal customer service team to reduce the time they spent supporting customers, building services to allow bulk importing, custom data migrations, and other time saving features
Lead initiative for redeveloping dialog system to allow for quicker setup and onboarding of new employees, 50% decrease in ramp up time for new hires by decreasing complexity
Integrated with Third Party API's to perform actions such as query patient information, and collate symptoms into a diagnosis
Created models using a feedforward neural network to predict intents while utilizing local entity library so we could predict the patients intents
Created and Supported a Live Chat service which utilized Signal R for websocket management to provide P2P and bot communication
Integrated with GBM to provide bot integration into google listings
Built a service to consume Kafka messages and pull data for Health Risk Assessment forms from a common form service
Maintained a python based service used to train models using tensorflow
Utilized worker patterns to queue and complete work async from the main thread to speed up requests
Monitored and Optimized slow SQL Queries using execution plans to improve our response time from chat bot
Utilized Redis as an internal cache layer to reduce strain on database and improve speed of retrieval
Covered business logic with testing to provide full coverage with unit tests using XUnit, and integration tests where needed
Used Checkly to run SLA test suits using playwright to ensure we were meeting uptime requirements
Created a NPM package using rollup to share UI components between multiple projects
Created and Maintained Azure DevOps pipelines utilizing YAML configurations based on shared templates
Built internal application for performing database migrations during CI/CD Releases utilizing on DBUP
Used Helm Charts to template deployments into Kubernetes for horizontal scaling on demand
Created versioned docker images pushed into a container repository to be ran in multiple environments

Supported an internal backup system for running as a service on windows server machines
Provided support for existing applications for customers
